Question: This person was inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1984 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2011.
Hints: This person was back to writing songs on an upright piano above the Birdland Club in New York City.
His parents were Rose (née Rapaport) and Akeeba "Kieve" this person, a dry-goods merchant.
There is a popular misconception that this person wrote and composed these songs specifically for the made-for-TV quartet.
